#summary Glossary of concepts and abstractions represented by Topsy Resources.

= Introduction =

== Influence Levels == 

Influence is an [http://labs.topsy.com/influence attention measure] computed by Topsy.  The influence level goes from 0-10 and represent Topsy influence of an author.  Influence of 9 and greater corresponds to the "Highly Influential" tag and influence of 3 and great corresponds to the "Influential" tag o Topsy.com.
